Becoming a Leading Integrated Service Provider

We believe that we have a unique capability to connect our expertise in biotech, fine chemistry, formulation and application technology, delivery systems, microbial control, and regulatory and quality requirements, which allows Lonza to provide the best solutions for our customers to meet some of the world's greatest challenges.

At Lonza we strive for integrated offerings across technologies and along the entire Contract Development and Manufacturing Organization (CDMO) value chain to leverage synergies in technologies and know-how in order to provide full-service offerings to our customers in the pharma and health markets — from gene to patient, from nutritional ingredient to consumer and from microbial control to safe surroundings.

The Capsugel acquisition in July 2017 represented a major leap forward in our strategic quest to become the world’s leading integrated solutions provider across the healthcare continuum.
